acceptance_criteria: Settings adjusted to work with OpenAI API and Google Client.
Documentation on environment variable setup provided.
major_tasks.description: Initialize the Django project and configure the necessary settings for the email parser application.
major_tasks.title: Set Up Django Backend

acceptance_criteria: Emails can be parsed and tasks identified accurately under various scenarios.
Implementation that categorizes emails into needs response, needs task, or both.
major_tasks.description: Develop the functionality to parse incoming emails in JSON format and filter tasks based on their urgency and required actions.
major_tasks.title: Implement Email Parsing Logic

acceptance_criteria: OpenAI API integrated with the backend.
Responses generated meet quality standards and are contextually relevant.
major_tasks.description: Set up the connection to the OpenAI API for drafting human-like responses to emails that require a response.
major_tasks.title: Integrate OpenAI API

acceptance_criteria: Users can view, manage tasks and responses from the email parser.
major_tasks.description: Create a user-friendly interface using React.js to display parsed email tasks and allow users to interact with tasks easily.
major_tasks.title: Develop React.js Frontend

acceptance_criteria: Google Client connection working, able to add events to Google Calendar.
major_tasks.description: Establish a connection with Google services for scheduling tasks and syncing with the user's Google Calendar.
major_tasks.title: Setup Google Client Connection

acceptance_criteria: Email processing time is under the target threshold.
Accuracy rate for identifying tasks is above the specified benchmark.
major_tasks.description: Optimize the application to ensure low latency in email processing and task identification.
major_tasks.title: Performance Optimization

acceptance_criteria: All functionalities are tested across various scenarios.
Bugs and issues documented and resolved before release.
major_tasks.description: Conduct thorough testing of both frontend and backend to ensure overall application functionality.
major_tasks.title: Testing and QA
